note: Clinical & forensic psychologist, sometimes a writer, sometimes a photographer / digital artist. WGAwest, SFWA. My interests include depth & existential psychology, psychedelic revolutions ('60s & now), spec & mainstream fiction, the connections between narrative and identity, art & design, space and the night sky, and nature, preserved & lost. Will always be amazed by leafy sea dragons, will always mourn the Great Auk. Currently teaching at Hawai'i Pacific University in Honolulu.
